name: Calm Storms
range: Immediate area around the mage (one mile / level)
description: Reduce or dissipate storm conditions (wind, rain, waves) over a broad area; useful for calming tempestuous weather.
effects: Weather control: reduce wind, rain, waves
Affects up to one mile per caster level

name: Agony
description: Inflicts intense, debilitating pain on the victim. The subject is incapacitated (no attacks, cannot move or speak) but does not suffer physical damage; effects linger briefly after spell ends.
effects: Incapsulates target in extreme pain
Reduces attacks and speed; penalties to strike/parry/dodge

name: Create Zombie (ritual)
description: Ritual to animate a recently deceased corpse into an obedient undead zombie. The zombie is resilient to many magics and must be destroyed or exorcised to stop it.
effects: Creates undead servant (zombie)
Zombie resists many magics; vulnerable to energy attacks and fire

name: Animate and Control Dead
duration: 5 minutes (20 melees) per level of experience
description: Animate corpses or control existing undead within line of vision, commanding them as mindless servants while within range.
effects: Animate corpses and control undead
Limited to line of vision and quantity restrictions

name: Constrain Being
description: Hold or restrain a lesser supernatural creature or being at bay with simple commands; effective against many lesser entities.
effects: Restrains or holds supernatural creatures at bay
Prevents simple actions while maintained

name: Dispel Magic Barriers
description: Negates or destroys magical barriers, seals, wards and similar constructs within range; the target barrier may roll a save against the attempt.
effects: Remove/negate magic barriers and wards
Barrier receives a standard save vs the dispel

name: Summon and Control Entity (ritual)
description: Ritual to pluck a supernatural entity from its native dimension and place it under the caster's control for the duration; powerful and potentially risky if the entity remains when duration lapses.
effects: Summons a powerful supernatural being
Entity is under caster's control for duration

name: Summon and Control Rain (ritual)
range: Immediate area or up to 10 miles per level
description: Create and control rainstorms over a wide area; intensity and coverage scale with caster level.
effects: Generate rainstorm; control intensity (drizzle to downpour)
Affects travel and visibility over area

name: Time Hole
description: Place the caster and possessions into a stasis-like pocket (a white void) where outside time passes more quickly; useful for hiding and recovery.
effects: Temporal stasis pocket for caster and gear
Aging occurs normally inside; outside time moves slower

name: Globe of Silence
description: Create an invisible 10ft radius globe which absorbs all sound, preventing speech and sonic effects within its area.
effects: Total silence inside globe; prevents spoken incantations
Can be fixed in place or mentally moved by caster
